description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8fs44","text":"This protocol describe the procedures used to clean and passivate a coverglass surface, functionalise it with biotin and specifically immobilise proteins of interest for detection with single channel imaging (SiMPull), two-colour coincidence aggregate detection (STAPull) or ThT detection (SAVE imaging) on a TIRF microscope. This protocol supports published work (Saleeb et al., 2023). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: MRC National Productivity Investment Fund studentship
MND Association Lady Edith Wolfson Junior Non-Clinical Fellowship

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"8n4ue","text":"Equipment: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2ai7","text":"Diener Electronic ZeptoOne Plasma Cleaner","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7coc8","text":"Oxford Nanoimager","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dssdv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ft9p4","text":"Consumbles:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4p0j2","text":"Coverslips (Merck, C9056-1CS)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"198ld","text":"Ibidi 18-well gasket (Ibidi, 81818)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6pqlv","text":"0.02-micron syringe filters (Merck, WHA68092002)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31oe8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5k7qr","text":"Reagents:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"culr6","text":"Potassium hydroxide (Merck, 221473-500G)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ubq3","text":"Acetic acid (Merck, 33209-2.5L-M)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8u60q","text":"APTMS (Merck, 281778-5ML)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1moik","text":"Methanol (Merck, 32213-2.5l-M)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bauo6","text":"mPEG-SVA (5000 Da, Laysan Bio)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7cub4","text":"Biotinylated mPEG-SVA (5000 Da, Laysan Bio)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9tgvt","text":"Sodium hydrogen carbonate (Fisher Scientific, 10020510)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ctjfr","text":"Streptavidin (ThermoFisher Scientific, 21122)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aj8ob","text":"Capture antibody, PS129 anti-aSynuclein (Abcam, ab209422) biotinylated by kit (Pierce, 90407)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1vn7v","text":"Detection antibody, 1:1 mix of PS129 anti-aSynuclein labelled with AF488 or labelled with AF647 by kit (ThermoFisher, A20181/6)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"18vd","text":"Thioflavin T (Merck, 596200-500MG)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4pr3d","text":"Treat coverslips with argon plasma for 45 mins","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bbbeu","text":"Immerse coverslips in 0.22 micron-filtered 1M potassium hydroxide for 20mins","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ap071","text":"Rinse coverslips in ultrapure deionised water and immerse in APTMS solution (prepared as 3.75 mL glacial acetic acid, 1 mL APTMS, 75 mL methanol) and incubate covered for 20 mins at RT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f9e3r","text":"Rinse coverslips sequentially in methanol and ultrapure deionised water and use fast flowing argon to dry slides rapidly. Inspect slide to ensure visually clean. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8cees","text":"Attach 18-well Ibidi sticky-slide chamber to coverslip, apply pressure to ensure fully adhered.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2k5vf","text":"Dispense 50 uL mPEG solution per well (95mg/mL mPEG-SVA, 5 mg/mL biotin-PEG, 0.1M sodium hydrogen carbonate), parafilm seal chamber and incubate covered overnight at RT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8hlgr","text":"Empty PEG solution by inversion and wash wells with ultrapure deionised water x3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"78dr3","text":"Dry wells thoroughly using fast-flowing argon gas","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cvre3","text":"Apply 50 uL 0.2 mg/mL streptavidin prepared in 0.02-micron filtered T50 buffer (10 mM Tris pH 8.0 supplemented with 50 mM sodium chloride) per well and incubate covered for 10mins at RT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1r8j7","text":"Wash wells with 0.02-micron filtered T50 buffer x3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bddf2","text":"Apply 50 uL of 100 nM biotinylated capture antibody and incubate covered for 20 mins at RT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bi2gh","text":"Wash wells with 0.02-micron filtered PBS x3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6c7ob","text":"Apply 50 uL neat CSF per well and incubate covered for 24 hours at RT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c962g","text":"Wash wells with 0.02-micron filtered PBS x3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25qr7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aa94n","text":"NB. CSF is biohazardous, aspirate to remove liquid waste instead of slide inversion","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5vhb3","text":"Apply 50 uL 2nM fluorophore-labelled detection antibody and incubate covered for 3 hours at RT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9mkfc","text":"Wash wells with 0.02-micron filtered PBS x3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"gort","text":"Apply 50 uL PBS per well and image immediately","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"apr8i","text":"Prepare approx. 4 mM stock of ThT in 100% ethanol and vortex extensively (approx. 1 hour)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a3q8r","text":"Prepare approx. 200 uM ThT dilution in PBS, vortex thoroughly (approx. 20 mins) and filter through 0.02-micron filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ee8ci","text":"Measure concentration of ThT preparation using a DeNovix spectrophotometer (extinction coefficient 36,000 M-1 cm-1 at 412 nm)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":107,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":112,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c2cq0","text":"Prepare a 10 uM working stock in 0.02-micron filtered PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"92aua","text":"Acquire an 8 x 8 grid of 200-micron spaced fields of view per well by total internal reflection fluorescence microscopy using the ONI Nanoimager with 100x/1.4 oil immersion objective lens. Samples are sequentially excited at 638nm and 488 nm, 20 frames captured per field in each channel at 20 frames s-1. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":302,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3aonk","text":"On completion of imaging one well, return to position 0 (based on metadata values), cautiously apply 50 uL 10 uM ThT and re-image all fields with 405nm excitation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Single-molecule pulldown for immunodetection of protein aggregates
